amendment.description: To provide for reconciliation instructions to the relevant committees for the purpose of repealing and replacing the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1277 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 66. Record Vote Number: 238.

action.text: Amendment SA 1277 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6622-6623, S6625; text: CR S6623) To provide for reconciliation instructions to the relevant committees for the purpose of repealing and replacing the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1277 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 66. Record Vote Number: 238.
